name: Mexican-Spiced Pumpkin Seeds
author: Kristin Cragg
summary: Mexican-spiced pumpkin seeds provide a nice alternative to the sweet/salty standard. Optional: Soak pumpkin seeds overnight in salt water.
ingredients: 1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil; spray with cooking spray
Spread pumpkin seeds onto the prepared baking sheet; sprinkle with salt, cumin, chili powder, cayenne pepper, and oregano; toss to coat evenly
Bake seeds in the preheated oven for 5 minutes; stir seeds
Return to oven and bake until seeds are toasted, about 15 more minutes
